name: 21 Solitaire: Card Game
description:
Skillz-powered 21 Solitaire is a new twist on Classic Solitaire. A modern version with eSports competitions and cash giveaways.


Compete in multiple tournaments and head-to-head for cash prizes.


Main function:


- Make 21s or stack 5 cards to get points.

- It only takes 3 minutes to win a contest.

- Get the best score and take advantage of the combos you get.

- Unique game mode that allows you to earn cash in just 3 minutes.

- Zero ads and a completely free-to-play concept.

Challenge people around the world with Skillz®, a completely competitive platform with leaderboards, trophies, cash, or free virtual currency prizes.

Tournaments with prizes are available. Prize tournaments are disabled in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, IN, LA, ME, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don't live in a real prize area, you can still have fun with our virtual currency.
